title: Is it over for Will Smith? The real reason the slap got so big
description:
Hey Fools! This week Manny talks about his near death experience in Cabo, and Laura talks about her 2nd degree burns she got at Manny's bday party... They also talk about the Will Smith + Chris Rock slapping incident, Kourtney and Travis Las Vegas wedding, and Blac Chyna’s Lawsuit Against the Kardashians!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
Thanks to our sponsors:

Upgrade your top drawer with an exclusive 20% off Parade. Go to yourparade.com/FOOL 

Start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials, including their best-selling suitcases at awaytravel.com/fool. 

Avoid the takeout temptation and get Daily Harvest! Go to dailyharvest.com/fool to get up to forty dollars off your first box! 

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Fool Coverage with Manny MUA and Laura Lee listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage.

Hey Fools! This week Manny talks about his near death experience in Cabo, and Laura talks about her 2nd degree burns she got at Manny's bday party... They also talk about the Will Smith + Chris Rock slapping incident, Kourtney and Travis Las Vegas wedding, and Blac Chyna’s Lawsuit Against the Kardashians!

Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee

Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
